Title: Give a warm send-off to educated youth who go up the mountains and down to the villages to wage revolution
Designer: Shi Fuguo (施福国)Wang Youjun (汪幼军)
Publisher: Shanghai renmin chubanshe (上海人民出版社)
Notes: The location must be Shanghai, with the Television Tower, built in 1972, in the background.
Theme: Up to the mountains, down to the villages (1968)
